note: GDP is measured in 2017 constant [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) which adjusts for inflation and cross-country price differences.
title: Changes in energy use vs. changes in GDP
subtitle: Consumption-based (trade-adjusted) energy use measures domestic energy use minus energy used to produce exported goods, plus energy used to produce imported goods.
sourceDesc: Energy data is calculated by Viktoras Kulionis, based on the EXIOBASE v3.8.2 database; GDP data from the World Bank
